# idsec_sia_settings_settings (Resource)

<a id="nestedatt--adb_mfa_caching"></a>
### Nested Schema for `adb_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Whether MFA caching is enabled
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) Expiration time for the MFA caching key in seconds


<a id="nestedatt--certificate_validation"></a>
### Nested Schema for `certificate_validation`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether certificate validation is enabled

### Nested Schema for `k_8_s_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) Expiration time for the MFA caching key in seconds


<a id="nestedatt--logon_sequence"></a>
### Nested Schema for `logon_sequence`

Optional:

- `always_use_sia` (Boolean) Whether to always use SIA for logon sequence
- `logon_sequence` (String) Configuration for the tenant logon sequence


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_file_transfer"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_file_transfer`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether RDP file transfer is enabled


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_kerberos_auth_mode"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_kerberos_auth_mode`

Optional:

- `auth_mode` (String) The Kerberos authentication mode for RDP connections (DO_NOT_USE,NEGOTIATE,ENFORCE)


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_keyboard_layout"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_keyboard_layout`

Optional:

- `layout` (String) Keyboard layout for RDP sessions

### Nested Schema for `rdp_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Whether MFA caching is enabled
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) Expiration time for the MFA caching key in seconds

### Nested Schema for `rdp_recording`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether SIA RDP recording is enabled


<a id="nestedatt--rdp_token_mfa_caching"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rdp_token_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Whether client IP is enforced for token MFA caching
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Whether token MFA caching is enabled
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) Expiration time for the token MFA caching key in seconds

### Nested Schema for `rdp_transcription`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether SIA RDP transcription is enabled


<a id="nestedatt--self_hosted_pam"></a>
### Nested Schema for `self_hosted_pam`

Optional:

- `connector_pool_id` (String) The ID of the connector pool to use for self-hosted PAM
- `is_ip_based_lb_enabled` (Boolean) Whether IP-based load balancing is enabled for self-hosted PAM
- `pvwa_base_url` (String) The base URL of the PVWA for self-hosted PAM
- `service_user_secret_id` (String) The secret ID of the service user for self-hosted PAM
- `tenant_type` (String) The type of tenant for self-hosted PAM (PCLOUD,SELF_HOSTED)


<a id="nestedatt--ssh_command_audit"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssh_command_audit`

Optional:

- `is_command_parsing_for_audit_enabled` (Boolean) Whether command parsing for audit is enabled
- `shell_prompt_for_audit` (String) The shell prompt used for audit


<a id="nestedatt--ssh_mfa_caching"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssh_mfa_caching`

Optional:

- `client_ip_enforced` (Boolean) Whether client IP is enforced for MFA caching
- `is_mfa_caching_enabled` (Boolean) Whether MFA caching is enabled
- `key_expiration_time_sec` (Number) Expiration time for the MFA caching key in seconds


<a id="nestedatt--ssh_recording"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssh_recording`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether SIA SSH recording is enabled


<a id="nestedatt--standing_access"></a>
### Nested Schema for `standing_access`

Optional:

- `adb_standing_access_available` (Boolean) Whether ADB standing access is available
- `fingerprint_validation` (Boolean) Whether fingerprint validation is enabled
- `rdp_standing_access_available` (Boolean) Whether RDP standing access is available
- `session_idle_time` (Number) Idle time before a session is considered inactive
- `session_max_duration` (Number) Maximum duration of a session
- `ssh_standing_access_available` (Boolean) Whether SSH standing access is available
- `standing_access_available` (Boolean) Whether standing access is available
